entries.content: Starting session: Adding emoji picker/support for user messages in Sementix UI. Goal is to let users send emoji to Claude through the chat interface.

Icon key naming confirmed: Subfolder icons use 'folder/filename' pattern WITHOUT camelCase conversion. Root-level icons get camelCase. Example: ui-icons/emoji-toggle.svg â†’ data-icon="ui-icons/emoji-toggle"
Creating custom lightweight emoji picker module following Sementix's ultra-modular architecture pattern. Researching existing UI controller patterns to match code style.

SUCCESS: Created custom lightweight emoji picker module for Sementix! Features: (1) EmojiPickerController class with 150+ emojis (2) Grid-based popup UI with smooth animations (3) Click toggle button to open/close (4) Insert emoji at cursor position in textarea (5) Auto-close on outside click (6) Gold hover effect on toggle button (7) Zero external dependencies - pure vanilla JS. Integration: Added to UserInputController lifecycle.

Enhanced emoji picker with search functionality! Added: (1) Search box at top with instant filtering (2) Fixed horizontal scroll overflow (3) Keyword-based emoji search (150+ emojis with searchable keywords) (4) "No results" message (5) Auto-focus search on open (6) Flexbox layout for proper structure. Clean, responsive UX with zero external dependencies.

FINAL emoji picker complete! Added: (1) Recently Used section showing last 16 emojis (2) Persistent localStorage storage (3) Auto-updates on emoji click (4) "Recently Used" label with divider (5) Raised picker position by 25% (bottom: 62px). Smart deduplication - clicking same emoji moves it to front. Hidden when empty. Complete professional emoji picker with zero dependencies!

Added AI Provider icons to emoji picker! First section shows Claude (orange), OpenAI (white), Gemini (blue), Qwen (blue) colored icons. Clicking inserts @providername into textarea. Uses ProviderIconComponent for consistent rendering. Full picker order: (1) AI Providers (2) Recently Used (16) (3) All Emojis (150+). Stays open for multi-emoji selection. Complete professional picker!
